Articles.Content: I updated the game to 1.1.0 and the naveball and a few other UI Items appear to be rather big on the screen. Turning down the UI size makes non large items tiny though. how can I change the size of the navball?

The Navball has been re-sized for 1.1, or at least the UI has and has also been made scale-able.  As you say though turning down the UI size can make other parts impossibly hard to read or see.

There is a mod called MakeItSmall that you can use to tweak these things separately and to your hearts content should you so wish.  You can find it here
